fr.escape.game.entity.weapons

Interface Weapon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Updateable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractWeapon

    public interface Weapon
extends Updateable
    The Weapon Interface define the needed operation for a Weapon.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getDrawable

        Texture getDrawable()
        Get the Texture.
        Returns:
        Return the Texture.

      • getAmmunition

        int getAmmunition()
        Get Weapon ammunitions.
        Returns:
        Return the ammunitions of a Weapon.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Check if their is ammunitions left.
        Returns:
        Return true if the ammunition value is at 0, false otherwise.

      • getShot

        Shot getShot()
        Get the Weapon Shot.
        Returns:
        Return the Weapon Shot.

      • load

        boolean load(float x,
           float y,
           Shot.ShotContext context)
        Load the Shot in the Weapon
        Parameters:
        x - : Coordinate on X axis in meters.
        y - : Coordinate on Y axis in meters.
        context - : The Shot.ShotContext use to initialize the Shot.
        Returns:
        Return true if the Shot was successfully loaded, false otherwise.

      • reload

        boolean reload(int number)
        Reload the Weapon.
        Parameters:
        number - : Number of ammunitions to add.
        Returns:
        Return true if the reloading was successful, false otherwise.

      • unload

        boolean unload()
        Unload the Shot in the Weapon.
        Returns:
        Return true if the unloading was a success, false otherwise.

      • fire

        boolean fire(float[] velocity,
           Shot.ShotContext context)
        Fire a Shot.
        Parameters:
        velocity - : The Shot velocity.
        context - : The Shot.ShotContext use by the Shot launched.
        Returns:
        Return true if the Shot was launched, false otherwise.

      • update

        void update(Graphics graphics,
          long delta)
        Call Updateable.update(Graphics, long) on the loaded Shot if any
        Specified by:
        update in interface Updateable
        Parameters:
        graphics - Graphics which can be used for drawing this Entity.
        delta - Time elapsed since the last update
        See Also:
        Updateable.update(Graphics, long)

      • reset

        boolean reset()
        Reset a Weapon to is initial values.
        Returns:
        Return true if the reset was done successfully, false otherwise.
